subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Shahar Peer became the first Israeli to compete in a WTA Tour event in the Gulf Arab region, when she defeated Andreja Klepac of Slovenia, 6-3, 6-4, to reach the second round in the Qatar Open in Doha. Peer and Klepac played before about 50 spectators. Despite the empty stands, Peer was pleased with the reception. “I have been received with a lot of warmth by people in Doha,” she said.
